purpose: Defends the body against infection and disease, drains excess fluids from tissues, and recycles proteins back into the blood.

interfaces.name: Fluid Recycling
interfaces.description: Returns excess tissue fluid and proteins to the cardiovascular system. Verified by physiology literature.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources (NCBI, PubMed)

interfaces.name: Immune Defense
interfaces.description: Works with immune system to defend against infection and disease. Verified by immunology literature.
interfaces.source_verification: Existing - verified by authoritative sources (NCBI, PubMed)

verification_notes: Based on established anatomical and physiological sources.

justification.rationale: Standard anatomical model; all interfaces are well-documented in literature.
